title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles on opinion mining in the context of natural language processing (NLP), including some that focus on the analysis of arguments from a social science perspective. These articles are selected to provide a comprehensive overview of the field and its interdisciplinary connections
**"Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis"** by Bo Pang and Lillian Lee
A foundational survey of the field, covering key techniques and applications
**"Sentiment Analysis and Opinion Mining"** by Bing Liu
A comprehensive book that provides an in-depth look at sentiment analysis and opinion mining
**"Aspect-based Sentiment Analysis: A Survey"** by Devika Madalli and Pushpak Bhattacharyya
A detailed survey on aspect-based sentiment analysis, a subfield of opinion mining
**"Deep Learning for Sentiment Analysis: A Survey"** by Yoon Kim
An overview of deep learning techniques applied to sentiment analysis
**"A Survey on Sentiment Analysis in Social Media: Facebook, Twitter, and Beyond"** by Alexander Pak and Patrick Paroubek
Focuses on sentiment analysis in social media platforms
**"Argument Mining: A Survey"** by Andreas Peldszus and Manfred Stede
A survey of argument mining, which is closely related to opinion mining
**"Mining Opinions in Comparative Sentences"** by Wei-Hao Lin and Alexander Hauptmann
Discusses techniques for extracting opinions from comparative sentences
**"Sentiment Analysis: A Combined Approach"** by Erik Cambria
Proposes a combined approach to sentiment analysis using multiple techniques
**"Opinion Mining from Online Reviews: A Comparative Study"** by Minqing Hu and Bing Liu
A comparative study of different methods for opinion mining from online reviews
The Detection, Classification, and Structure of Arguments in Text"** by Marie-Francine Moens
Discusses the detection and classification of arguments in text
**"Analyzing Sentiment in Social Media: An Overview"** by Apoorv Agarwal, Boyi Xie
Provides an overview of sentiment analysis techniques applied to social media
**"A Survey on Argument Mining from Text"** by Elena Cabrio and Serena Villata
A survey focusing on the extraction of arguments from text
**"Sentiment Analysis: Mining Opinions, Sentiments, and Emotions"** by Bing Liu
A book that covers various aspects of sentiment analysis, including opinion mining
**"Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis on a Twitter Dataset"** by Alexander Pak and Patrick Paroubek
Focuses on opinion mining and sentiment analysis on Twitter data
**"Argumentation Mining in User-Generated Web Content"** by Raquel Mochales and Marie-Francine Moens
Discusses argumentation mining in user-generated content on the web
**"Sentiment Analysis and Opinion Mining: A Survey"** by Ravi Kumar and Suresh Kumar
A survey of sentiment analysis and opinion mining techniques
**"Mining and Summarizing Customer Reviews"** by Minqing Hu and Bing Liu
Techniques for mining and summarizing customer reviews
**"Argument Mining: The Role of Argumentation in Artificial Intelligence"** by Chris Reed and Derek G
Discusses the role of argumentation in AI and its connection to opinion mining
**"Sentiment Analysis: An Overview and Comparative Study of Techniques"** by Erik Cambria
An overview and comparative study of sentiment analysis techniques
**"Analyzing Arguments in Social Media: A Case Study on Facebook"** by Elena Cabrio
A case study on analyzing arguments in social media, specifically Facebook

These articles should provide a solid foundation for understanding the current state of opinion mining and its applications in NLP, as well as insights from a social science perspective on argument analysis
